comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content:
Trove is amazing -  from Cairns Post 22/5/1924 p.4 -
"  S.S. Kut.
The steamer Kut, of the Australian Oriental Line (Messrs. Bartlams Ltd., agents), is expected to leave Sydney for Manila, Hong Kong, Moji, Kobe, Osaka, and Yokohama on the 3rd
June,  if sufficient inducement offers, the vessel will call at Cairns. "

Some other articles mention her taking zinc to Japan.
